content: I am disabling SSL v3 and TLS v1 support on my server. That leaves me only supporting TLS 1.2 on my server. I have a note from a couple of years ago that TLS 1 was required for dotnet support. That seems to no longer be true.

TLS best practices for the .NET Framework...https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/framework/network-programming/tls
Bottom line is that all .NET applications SHOULD support TLS 1.2
